title: Is any one missing a skin?
body: My SKT T1 zyra skin is missing.

replies.body:
That's strange! Perhaps the data that stores Zyra's skin is missing and preventing you from selecting it. As a quick check, I recommend [running a repair of the client's files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) to see if it resolves this.

Let me know if that repair changed anything.
not really i just waited til worlds and then it like remember that i bought it so......
